snippet: Treasury Secretary Timothy F. Geithner hopes to enlist China in a campaign to use sanctions to pressure Iran and convince Beijing to change its economic policies to American liking.
abstract: Treasury Secretary Timothy F. Geithner hopes to enlist China in a campaign to use sanctions to pressure Iran and to convince Beijing to change its economic policies and soften its opposition to a stronger renminbi, a more than could help the American economy.

byline.contributor: Mia Li contributed research. Keith Bradsher contributed reporting from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: Treasury Secretary Timothy F. Geithner hopes to enlist China in a campaign to use sanctions to pressure Iran and convince Beijing to change its economic policies to American liking.

headline.main: In Talks With the Chinese, Geithner Faces an Uphill Climb
headline.print_headline: In Talks With the Chinese, Geithner Faces an Uphill Climb
